ITEM.NAME: EMBEDDED
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MapR_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

ITEM.NAME: STANDALONE
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVE_SERVER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR213') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR301') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR310') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401')))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: JOBTRACKER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCEMANAGER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT' AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR401' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: EXECUTION_ENGINE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') AND ((DISTRIBUTION == 'CUSTOM') OR ((DISTRIBUTION == 'HORTONWORKS') AND (HIVE_VERSION == 'HDP_2_1')) OR ((DISTRIBUTION == 'MAPR') AND (HIVE_VERSION == 'MAPR401'))) AND (LOAD_ACTION == 'INSERT')

PARAMETER.NAME: PARQUET_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: Parquet is only supported if the distribution uses embedded Hive version 0.10 or later.

PARAMETER.NAME: TARGET_TABLE_IS_A_PARQUET_TABLE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='true' OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' OR (HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_0_20_203' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_1_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1'))) AND ((LOAD_ACTION=='LOAD') OR ((LOAD_ACTION=='INSERT') AND (TARGET=='TABLE'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: If you are on Windows, add a '/' in front of the path you type in.

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT')))

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')))

IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MapR_EMR') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-hive-bundle-1.5.0
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((isShow[PARQUET_COMPRESSION]) AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='PIVOTAL_HD') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_0_20_203') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_1_0'))

IMPORT.NAME: snappy-java-1.0.5.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: ((isShow[PARQUET_COMPRESSION]) AND (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION=='false') AND (PARQUET_COMPRESSION=='SNAPPY') AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_0_20_203') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_1_0') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1'))
